data.title: What is the structure of war by luigi pirandello?
data.meta_description:
The literary style used by Luigi Pirandello in "War" is
symbolism. This popular short story revolves around World War II,
and the impact is had on Italy. This includes injured soldiers
returning home, only to be sent out again once their injuries
healed. The short story, however, captures the allure and essence
of all those involved in the European conflict at the time. This
includes their conversations about love, conflict, and especially
political differences.
data.text:
The literary style used by Luigi Pirandello in "War" is symbolism. This popular short story revolves around World War II, and the impact is had on Italy. This includes injured soldiers returning home, only to be sent out again once their injuries healed. The short story, however, captures the allure and essence of all those involved in the European conflict at the time. This includes their conversations about love, conflict, and especially political differences.

How old is Luigi Pirandello?

Luigi Pirandello was born on June 28, 1867 and died on December 10, 1936. Luigi Pirandello would have been 69 years old at the time of death or 148 years old today.
